alert.note: Alert for Alleghany (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:35PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Alleghany County in west central Virginia and east central Greenbrier Counties in southeastern West Virginia through 715 PM EDT... At 634 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Falling Spring, or over Renick, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Renick... Neola... Falling Spring... Beartown State Park... Rorer... Natural Well... and Alvon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern West Virginia.
